Title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
Writer: Paul W.S. Anderson (story), Tony Giglio (screenplay), Tony Giglio (story), Don Michael Paul (screenplay)
Actors: Lucy Aarden, Nicholas Aaron, Jasette Amos, Victoria Ananieva
Plot: After an attack on inmate Frankenstein fails a Black Ops specialist enters the maximum prison to join the illegal Death Race and take down Frankenstein.
